TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit WebConfigurationManager extends System.Object
public ref class WebConfigurationManager abstract sealed

summary.span: 在配置文件应用于 Web 应用程序时提供对配置文件的访问。

span.span: Provides access to configuration files as they apply to Web applications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类可以访问计算机和应用程序信息。The class allows you to access computer and application information. 使用是可以使用 Web 应用程序相关的配置文件的首选的方法。Using is the preferred way to work with configuration files related to Web applications. 对于客户端应用程序使用类。For client applications, use the class. 你的应用程序可以扩展类型，或者直接使用它们来处理配置信息，如下面的列表中所述：Your application can extend the types or use them directly to handle configuration information, as explained in the following list: - `Handling configuration`。`Handling configuration`. 若要处理使用标准的类型的配置信息，你使用以下方法之一：To handle configuration information using the standard types, you use one of the following approaches: - `Accessing a section`。`Accessing a section`. 若要访问你的应用程序的配置信息，必须使用之一`GetSection`提供方法。To access configuration information for your application, you must use one of the `GetSection` methods provided by . 有关``和``，你使用和属性。For `` and ``, you use the and properties. 这些方法执行只读操作，使用单个缓存的实例的配置，是多线程感知。These methods perform read-only operations, use a single cached instance of the configuration, and are multithread aware. - `Accessing configuration files`。`Accessing configuration files`. 你的应用程序可以读取和写入任何级别的配置设置为其自身或其他应用程序或计算机，本地或远程。Your application can read and write configuration settings at any level, for itself or for other applications or computers, locally or remotely. 使用之一`open`提供方法。You use one of the `open` methods provided by . 这些方法将返回对象，它又提供所需的方法和属性，以处理基础的配置文件。These methods will return a object, which in turn provides the required methods and properties to handle the underlying configuration files. 这些方法执行读取或写入操作并重新创建的配置数据，每次打开文件。These methods perform read or write operations and recreate the configuration data every time a file is opened. - `Advanced configuration`。`Advanced configuration`. 由类型提供更高级的配置处理， ， ， ， ， ，和。More advanced configuration handling is provided by the types , , , , , , and . - `Extending configuration standard types`。`Extending configuration standard types`. 你还可以通过如扩展的标准配置类型提供自定义配置元素， ， ，和通过以编程方式或特性化的模型。You can also provide your custom configuration elements by extending the standard configuration types such as , , , and by using a programmatic or an attributed model. 请参阅举例说明如何以编程方式扩展标准配置类型的类。Refer to the class for an example of how to extend a standard configuration type programmatically. 请参阅举例说明如何扩展使用特性化的模型中的标准配置类型的类。Refer to the class for an example of how to extend a standard configuration type using the attributed model. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何访问配置信息。The following example shows how to access configuration information with the 方法。 method. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager/CS/WebConfigurationManager.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager/VB/WebConfigurationManager.vb#2)]

block.para:
类允许进行编程访问以编辑配置文件。The class allows programmatic access for editing configuration files. 使用提供的打开方法之一。You use one of the open methods provided by . 这些方法将返回对象，它又提供所需的方法和属性，以处理基础的配置文件。These methods will return a object, which in turn provides the required methods and properties to handle the underlying configuration files. 你可以访问这些文件进行读取或写入，如下所示：You can access these files for reading or writing as follows:
你使用或读取配置信息。You use or to read configuration information. 请注意的用户或读取的进程必须具有以下权限：Note that the user or process that reads must have the following permissions:
- 读取当前配置层次结构级别上对配置文件的权限。Read permission on the configuration file at the current configuration hierarchy level.
- 读取所有父权限配置文件。Read permissions on all the parent configuration files.
如果你的应用程序需要其自己的配置只读访问，建议你使用方法。If your application needs read-only access to its own configuration, it is recommended you use the methods. 这些方法提供了访问当前应用程序的缓存的配置值，具有更好的性能比类。These methods provide access to the cached configuration values for the current application, which has better performance than the class.
如果你使用静态采用的方法参数，path 参数必须引用的应用程序在其中运行代码; 否则，将忽略该参数和当前运行的配置信息返回应用程序。If you use a static method that takes a parameter, the path parameter must refer to the application in which the code is running; otherwise, the parameter is ignored and configuration information for the currently-running application is returned.
使用之一方法来写入配置信息。You use one of the methods to write configuration information. 请注意的用户或写入的进程必须具有以下权限：Note that the user or process that writes must have the following permissions:
- 写入权限的配置文件和当前配置层次结构级别上的目录。Write permission on the configuration file and directory at the current configuration hierarchy level.
- 对所有配置文件读取权限。Read permissions on all the configuration files.

summary.span: 获取该网站的应用程序设置。

span.span: Gets the Web site's application settings.

value.span: 一个 对象，它包含当前 Web 应用程序的默认配置的 对象。

span.span: A object that contains the object for the current Web application's default configuration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象包含配置文件的``部分。An object contains the configuration file's `` section. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何访问配置信息。方法。The following example shows how to access configuration information with the method. summary.span: 获取网站的连接字符串。

span.span: Gets the Web site's connection strings.

value.span: 一个 对象，它包含当前 Web 应用程序的默认配置的 对象的内容。

span.span: A object that contains the contents of the object for the current Web application's default configuration.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性访问配置信息并对结果进行枚举。The following example shows how to use the property to access configuration information and enumerate the results. 若要访问特定连接字符串，使用返回具有所需的连接字符串作为索引器的名称。To access a specific connection string, use the returned with the name of the desired connection string as an indexer. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager/CS/WebConfigurationManager.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager/VB/WebConfigurationManager.vb#7)]

exception.span: 未能检索到有效的 对象。

span.span: A valid object could not be retrieved.

summary.span: 从当前 Web 应用程序的默认配置文件中检索指定的配置节。

span.span: Retrieves the specified configuration section from the current Web application's default configuration file.

MemberSignature.Value: public static object GetSection (string sectionName);
.method public static hidebysig object GetSection(string sectionName) cil managed
Public Shared Function GetSection (sectionName As String) As Object
public: static System::Object ^ GetSection(System::String ^ sectionName);

param.name: sectionName
param.span: 配置节名称。

span.span: The configuration section name.

summary.span: 从当前 Web 应用程序的配置文件中检索指定的配置节。

span.span: Retrieves the specified configuration section from the current Web application's configuration file.

returns.span: 指定的配置节对象或 （如果该节不存在）。

span.span: The specified configuration section object, or if the section does not exist.

returns.span: 请记住，将 用作运行时操作存在安全限制。

span.span: Remember that security restrictions exist on the use of as a runtime operation.

returns.span: 例如，您可能无法在运行时访问某节以进行修改。

span.span: You might not be able to access a section at run time for modifications, for example.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果称为从在 Web 应用程序，它获取 Web 应用程序配置层次结构根据系统选择配置文件中的节。If is called from within a Web application, it gets the section from the configuration file selected by the system according to the Web-application configuration hierarchy. > [!CAUTION] > 如果你的应用程序使用 HTTP，不同的协议重载采用其参数列表中的节名称和路径是一个使用。If your application uses a different protocol than HTTP, the overload that takes both a section name and a path in its parameter list is the one to use. 你必须指定配置文件路径，因为系统无法配置层次结构级别做出任何假设。You must specify the configuration file path because the system cannot make any assumptions about the configuration hierarchy level. 如果你使用重载接受仅部分名称，系统将始终尝试返回应用程序级别的配置设置。If you use the overload that takes only a section name, the system will always attempt to return the configuration settings at the application level. 但是请注意，是否其指定的路径是在当前应用程序外部，采用的路径的重载还将返回当前正在运行的应用程序的应用程序级配置设置。Note, though, that if its specified path is outside of the current application, the overload that takes a path will also return the application-level configuration settings for the currently running application. 您可以调用从客户端应用程序中。You could call from within a client application. 在这种情况下，它将从选定的客户端配置层次结构根据系统配置文件获取默认节。In this case, it gets the default section from the configuration file selected by the system according to the client configuration hierarchy. 通常情况下，这是 Machine.config 文件中，除非你准备好的映射的配置。Usually, this is the Machine.config file, unless you have a mapped configuration in place. 有关映射配置文件，请参阅下文所述的映射方法。For mapping configuration files, refer to the mapping methods described next. > [!NOTE] > 方法是在层次结构级别对应用程序的运行配置文件节进行操作，运行时方法。The method is a run-time method that operates on the section of a configuration file at the hierarchy level in which the application runs. 对于非运行时操作，使用相反。For a non-run-time operation, use instead. 此方法的操作使用的重载的方法之一来打开配置文件，获取一个配置文件的指定部分。This method operates on the specified section of a configuration file that you obtain using one of the overloaded methods for opening a configuration file, . ## Examples 此部分中的示例演示如何访问配置信息。方法。The examples in this section show how to access configuration information with the method. 下面的示例演示一个段中，可以从 Web 应用程序或控制台应用程序访问。The following example shows a section that can be accessed from either a Web application or a console application. > [!NOTE] > 此示例演示如何使用方法以获取从配置文件的对象。This example demonstrates how to use the method to get a object from a configuration file. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager/CS/WebConfigurationManager.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager/VB/WebConfigurationManager.vb#2)]

exception.span: 未能加载有效的配置文件。

span.span: A valid configuration file could not be loaded.

para.span: 返回值必须转换为在使用之前的预期的配置类型。

span.span: The return value must be cast to the expected configuration type before use.

para.span: 若要避免可能出现的转换异常，应使用条件的强制转换操作，如C# 或 Visual Basic 中的函数中的运算符。

span.span: To avoid possible casting exceptions, you should use a conditional casting operation like the operator in C# or the function in Visual Basic.

returns.span: 请记住，将 用作运行时操作存在安全限制。

span.span: Remember that security restrictions exist on the use of as a run-time operation.

returns.span: 例如，您可能无法在运行时访问某节以进行修改。

span.span: You might not be able to access a section at run time for modifications, for instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果称为从在 Web 应用程序，它获取从配置层次结构中的指定路径定义的配置文件部分。If is called from within a Web application, it gets the section from the configuration file defined by the specified path in the configuration hierarchy. > [!CAUTION] > 如果你的应用程序使用 HTTP，不同的协议重载采用其参数列表中的节名称和路径是一个使用。If your application uses a different protocol than HTTP, the overload that takes both a section name and a path in its parameter list is the one to use. 你必须指定配置文件路径，因为系统无法配置层次结构级别做出任何假设。You must specify the configuration file path because the system cannot make any assumptions about the configuration hierarchy level. 如果你使用重载接受仅部分名称，系统将始终尝试返回应用程序级别的配置设置。If you use the overload that takes only a section name, the system will always attempt to return the configuration settings at the application level. 但是请注意，是否其指定的路径是在当前应用程序外部，采用的路径的重载还将返回当前正在运行的应用程序的应用程序级配置设置。Note, though, that if its specified path is outside of the current application, the overload that takes a path will also return the application-level configuration settings for the currently running application. 在客户端应用程序中，不能从调用此方法。This method cannot be called from within a client application. 如果你想要从位于当前 Web 应用程序目录级别中，使用配置文件中检索的配置节方法。If you want to retrieve the configuration section from the configuration file located at the current Web application directory level, use the method. > [!NOTE] > 方法是在对应用程序运行层次结构级别上配置文件的部分上的运行时方法。The method is a run-time method operating on the section of a configuration file at the hierarchy level in which the application runs. 对于非运行时操作，使用相反。For a non-run-time operation, use instead. 此方法的操作使用之一获取配置文件的指定部分`open`配置文件的方法。This method operates on the specified section of a configuration file that you obtain using one of the `open` configuration file methods. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何访问配置信息。方法。The following example shows how to access configuration information with the method. > [!NOTE] > 此示例演示如何使用方法以获取从指定的配置文件的对象。This example demonstrates how to use the method to get a object from a specified configuration file. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager/CS/WebConfigurationManager.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager/VB/WebConfigurationManager.vb#5)]

exception.span: 从 Web 应用程序外调用方法。

span.span: The method is called from outside a Web application.

exception.span: 未能加载有效的配置文件。

span.span: A valid configuration file could not be loaded.

para.span: 返回值必须转换为在使用之前的预期的配置类型。

span.span: The return value must be cast to the expected configuration type before use.

para.span: 若要避免可能出现的转换异常，应使用条件的强制转换操作，如C# 或 Visual Basic 中的函数中的运算符。

span.span: To avoid possible casting exceptions, you should use a conditional casting operation like the operator in C# or the function in Visual Basic.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果称为从在 Web 应用程序，它获取 Web 应用程序配置层次结构根据系统选择配置文件中的节。If is called from within a Web application, it gets the section from the configuration file selected by the system according to the Web-application configuration hierarchy. 您可以调用从客户端应用程序中。You could call from within a client application. 在这种情况下，它将从选定的客户端配置层次结构根据系统配置文件获取默认节。In this case, it gets the default section from the configuration file selected by the system according to the client configuration hierarchy. 通常情况下，这是 Machine.config 文件中，除非你准备好的映射的配置。Usually, this is the Machine.config file, unless you have a mapped configuration in place. 有关映射配置文件，请参阅下文所述的映射方法。For mapping configuration files, refer to the mapping methods described next. > [!NOTE] > 方法是在当前级别的应用程序配置文件的节作用的运行时操作。The method is a run-time operation that acts on the section of the application configuration file located at the current level. 方法，但是，不是运行时操作，但它对通过打开配置文件的方法之一获得的指定部分。The method, however, is not a run-time operation but acts on the specified section obtained through one of the methods for opening the configuration files. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何访问配置信息。方法。The following example shows how to access configuration information with the method. > [!NOTE] > 此示例演示如何使用方法以获取默认配置文件中的对象。This example demonstrates how to use the method to get a object from the default configuration file. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager/CS/WebConfigurationManager.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager/VB/WebConfigurationManager.vb#6)]

summary.span: 将计算机配置文件作为 对象打开以允许读或写操作。

span.span: Opens the machine-configuration file as a object to allow read or write operations.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Configuration.Configuration OpenMachineConfiguration ();

public: static System::Configuration::Configuration ^ OpenMachineConfiguration();

summary.span: 将当前计算机上的计算机配置文件作为 对象打开以允许读或写操作。

span.span: Opens the machine-configuration file on the current computer as a object to allow read or write operations.
A object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法打开应用程序在其中运行的计算机上的计算机配置文件。The method opens the machine-configuration file on the computer where the application runs. 此文件位于标准生成目录 %windir%\microsoft.net\framework\version\config 中。This file is located in the standard build directory %windir%\Microsoft.NET\Framework\version\config. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何访问配置信息。方法。The following example shows how to access configuration information with the method. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager/CS/WebConfigurationManager.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager/VB/WebConfigurationManager.vb#9)]

A object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法打开位于指定的目录中的计算机配置文件`locationSubPath`参数和由指定的计算机上`server`参数。This method opens the machine-configuration file that is located in the directory specified by the `locationSubPath` parameter and on the computer specified by the `server` parameter. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何访问配置信息。方法。The following example shows how to access configuration information with the method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于访问配置文件使用模拟。This method is used to access a configuration file using impersonation. > [!NOTE] > 用户的帐户标记通常从的实例检索类或通过调用非托管代码，如调用 Win32 API `LogonUser`。The account token is usually retrieved from an instance of the class or through a call to unmanaged code, such as a call to the Win32 API `LogonUser`. 有关调用非托管代码的详细信息，请参阅[使用非托管 DLL 函数](~/docs/framework/interop/consuming-unmanaged-dll-functions.md)。For more information about calls to unmanaged code, see [Consuming Unmanaged DLL Functions](~/docs/framework/interop/consuming-unmanaged-dll-functions.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何访问配置信息。方法。The following example shows how to access configuration information with the method. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager/CS/WebConfigurationManager.cs#12)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager/VB/WebConfigurationManager.vb#12)]

summary.span: 使用指定的文件映射将 Web 应用程序配置文件作为 对象打开以允许读或写操作。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你需要将虚拟目录层次结构映射到物理目录时，你可以使用映射机制。You use the mapping mechanism when you need to map your virtual directory hierarchy to a physical directory. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将虚拟目录层次结构映射到一个物理。The following example shows how to map a virtual directory hierarchy to a physical one. 此处显示的示例用于重载的成员。The example shown here is used in the overloaded members. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager/CS/WebConfigurationManager.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager/VB/WebConfigurationManager.vb#20)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Configuration.Configuration OpenMappedWebConfiguration (System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationFileMap fileMap, string path);

Public Shared Function OpenMappedWebConfiguration (fileMap As WebConfigurationFileMap, path As String) As Configuration
public: static System::Configuration::Configuration ^ OpenMappedWebConfiguration(System::Web::Configuration::WebConfigurationFileMap ^ fileMap, System::String ^ path);

param.name: fileMap
param.span: 用于替换默认 Web 应用程序配置文件的 对象。

span.span: The object to use in place of a default Web-application configuration file.

param.name: path
param.span: 配置文件的虚拟路径。

span.span: The virtual path to the configuration file.

summary.span: 使用指定的文件映射和虚拟路径将指定的 Web 应用程序配置文件作为 对象打开以允许读或写操作。

span.span: Opens the specified Web-application configuration file as a object using the specified file mapping and virtual path to allow read or write operations.
A object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要获取对象有关的资源，你的代码必须具有读取权限设置所继承的所有配置文件。To obtain the object for a resource, your code must have read privileges on all the configuration files from which it inherits settings. 若要更新的配置文件，你的代码还必须具有对配置文件及其所在所在目录的写入权限。To update a configuration file, your code must additionally have write privileges for both the configuration file and the directory in which it exists. ## Examples 下面的示例显示如何使用 方法。The following example shows how to use the method. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager#21](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager/CS/WebConfigurationManager.cs#21)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager#21](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager/VB/WebConfigurationManager.vb#21)] 前面的示例使用以下自定义方法来生成对象。The preceding example uses the following custom method to generate a object. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager/CS/WebConfigurationManager.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager/VB/WebConfigurationManager.vb#20)] 请参阅有关的示例，演示如何将虚拟目录层次结构映射到一个物理。Refer to for an example that shows how to map a virtual directory hierarchy to a physical one.

exception.span: 未能加载有效的配置文件。

span.span: A valid configuration file could not be loaded.

.method public static hidebysig class System.Configuration.Configuration OpenWebConfiguration(string path, string site, string locationSubPath, string server, native int userToken) cil managed
Public Shared Function OpenWebConfiguration (path As String, site As String, locationSubPath As String, server As String, userToken As IntPtr) As Configuration
public: static System::Configuration::Configuration ^ OpenWebConfiguration(System::String ^ path, System::String ^ site, System::String ^ locationSubPath, System::String ^ server, IntPtr userToken);

param.name: path
param.span: 配置文件的虚拟路径。

span.span: The virtual path to the configuration file.

param.name: site
param.span: 显示在 Internet 信息服务 (IIS) 配置中的应用程序网站的名称。

span.span: The name of the application Web site, as displayed in Internet Information Services (IIS) configuration.

param.name: locationSubPath
param.span: 配置应用的特定资源。

span.span: The specific resource to which the configuration applies.

param.name: server
param.span: Web 应用程序所在的服务器的网络名称。

span.span: The network name of the server the Web application resides on.

param.name: userToken
param.span: 要使用的帐户标记。

span.span: An account token to use.

summary.span: 使用指定的虚拟路径、站点名称、位置、服务器和安全上下文将 Web 应用程序配置文件作为 对象打开以允许读或写操作。

span.span: Opens the Web-application configuration file as a object using the specified virtual path, site name, location, server, and security context to allow read or write operations.
A object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于访问配置文件使用模拟。This method is used to access a configuration file using impersonation. > [!NOTE] > 用户的帐户标记通常从的实例检索类或通过调用非托管代码，如调用 Win32 API `LogonUser`。The account token is usually retrieved from an instance of the class or through a call to unmanaged code, such as a call to the Win32 API `LogonUser`. 有关调用非托管代码的详细信息，请参阅[使用非托管 DLL 函数](~/docs/framework/interop/consuming-unmanaged-dll-functions.md)。For more information about calls to unmanaged code, see [Consuming Unmanaged DLL Functions](~/docs/framework/interop/consuming-unmanaged-dll-functions.md). 若要获取对象的远程资源，你的代码必须在远程计算机上具有管理权限。To obtain the object for a remote resource, your code must have administrative privileges on the remote computer. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用以访问配置信息的方法。The following example shows how to use the method to access configuration information. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager#19](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager/CS/WebConfigurationManager.cs#19)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager#19](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager/VB/WebConfigurationManager.vb#19)]

exception.span: 或 参数无效。

span.span: The or parameters were invalid.

exception.span: 未能加载有效的配置文件。

span.span: A valid configuration file could not be loaded.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Configuration.Configuration OpenWebConfiguration (string path, string site, string locationSubPath, string server, string userName, string password);

.method public static hidebysig class System.Configuration.Configuration OpenWebConfiguration(string path, string site, string locationSubPath, string server, string userName, string password) cil managed
Public Shared Function OpenWebConfiguration (path As String, site As String, locationSubPath As String, server As String, userName As String, password As String) As Configuration

public: static System::Configuration::Configuration ^ OpenWebConfiguration(System::String ^ path, System::String ^ site, System::String ^ locationSubPath, System::String ^ server, System::String ^ userName, System::String ^ password);

param.name: path
param.span: 配置文件的虚拟路径。

span.span: The virtual path to the configuration file.

param.name: site
param.span: 显示在 Internet 信息服务 (IIS) 配置中的应用程序网站的名称。

span.span: The name of the application Web site, as displayed in Internet Information Services (IIS) configuration.

param.name: locationSubPath
param.span: 配置应用的特定资源。

span.span: The specific resource to which the configuration applies.

param.name: server
param.span: Web 应用程序所在的服务器的网络名称。

span.span: The network name of the server the Web application resides on.

param.name: userName
param.span: 打开文件时要使用的用户全名 (Domain\User)。

span.span: The full user name (Domain\User) to use when opening the file.

param.name: password
param.span: 用户名的密码。

span.span: The password for the user name.

summary.span: 使用指定的虚拟路径、站点名称、位置、服务器和安全上下文将 Web 应用程序配置文件作为 对象打开以允许读或写操作。

span.span: Opens the Web-application configuration file as a object using the specified virtual path, site name, location, server, and security context to allow read or write operations.
A object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于访问配置文件使用模拟。This method is used to access a configuration file using impersonation. 若要获取对象的远程资源，你的代码必须在远程计算机上具有管理权限。To obtain the object for a remote resource, your code must have administrative privileges on the remote computer. 你可能需要运行[ASP.NET IIS 注册工具 (Aspnet_regiis.exe)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6491c41e-e2b0-481f-9863-db3614d5f96b)与`-config+`选项以启用对远程计算机上的配置文件的访问。You might need to run the [ASP.NET IIS Registration Tool (Aspnet_regiis.exe)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6491c41e-e2b0-481f-9863-db3614d5f96b) with the `-config+` option to enable access to the configuration files on the remote computer. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何访问配置信息。方法。The following example shows how to access configuration information with the method. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager#18](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager/CS/WebConfigurationManager.cs#18)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager#18](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager/VB/WebConfigurationManager.vb#18)]

exception.span: 或 和 参数无效。

span.span: The or and parameters were invalid.

exception.span: 未能加载有效的配置文件。

span.span: Could not load a valid configuration file.
